metadata.Title: CVE-2021-43519 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description: Stack overflow in lua_resume of ldo.c in Lua Interpreter 5.1.0~5.4.4 allows attackers to perform a Denial of Service via a crafted script file.
